languages.text: "Я не намерен усаживать своих братьев и сестер в кресла совета, мон-кай. Эта роль достанется людям — можешь сам{mf||а} выбрать угодных тебе на эту роль. Главное — чтобы они помнили, кто стоит у них за плечом, и внимали нашим наставлениям".

traits.locale_text: "Я не намерен усаживать своих братьев и сестер в кресла совета, мон-кай. Эта роль достанется людям — можешь сам{mf||а} выбрать угодных тебе на эту роль. Главное — чтобы они помнили, кто стоит у них за плечом, и внимали нашим наставлениям".

languages.text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."
languages.original_text: "Я не намерен усаживать своих братьев и сестер в кресла совета, мон-кай. Эта роль достанется людям — можешь сам{mf||а} выбрать угодных тебе на эту роль. Главное — чтобы они помнили, кто стоит у них за плечом, и внимали нашим наставлениям".

traits.locale_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. This role will be played by Humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind their shoulder and heed our direction."

"It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. This role will be played by Humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind their shoulder and heed our direction."

"It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

"It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

"It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

languages.text: “我并不打算让我的兄弟姐妹们坐在议会里，猴子。这个角色将由人类来扮演，你可以随意选择你的人来执行这项任务。只要那个人别忘了身后的人是谁，愿意服从我们的指示就好。”
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: “我并不打算让我的兄弟姐妹们坐在议会里，猴子。这个角色将由人类来扮演，你可以随意选择你的人来执行这项任务。只要那个人别忘了身后的人是谁，愿意服从我们的指示就好。”

languages.text: 「同胞を評議会の席に着かせるつもりはないぞ、モン＝ケイ。その役割は人間が担うもの—この職務を任せる人間は、お前が選べば良い。誰のお陰でその座に就いているのかを忘れることなく、我らの指示に従う者であれば誰でも構わぬ」
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: 「同胞を評議会の席に着かせるつもりはないぞ、モン＝ケイ。その役割は人間が担うもの—この職務を任せる人間は、お前が選べば良い。誰のお陰でその座に就いているのかを忘れることなく、我らの指示に従う者であれば誰でも構わぬ」

languages.text: "Ich habe nicht die Absicht, meine Brüder und Schwestern im Rat zu platzieren, Chem-Pan-Sey. Diese Rolle werden Menschen übernehmen – Ihr könnt für diese Aufgabe wählen, wen Ihr wollt. Solange besagte Person nicht vergisst, wer hinter ihr steht, und unseren Anweisungen Folge leistet."
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nicht die Absicht, meine Brüder und Schwestern im Rat zu platzieren, Chem-Pan-Sey. Diese Rolle werden Menschen übernehmen – Ihr könnt für diese Aufgabe wählen, wen Ihr wollt. Solange besagte Person nicht vergisst, wer hinter ihr steht, und unseren Anweisungen Folge leistet."

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas l'intention de faire siéger mes frères et sœurs au conseil, mon-keigh. Ce rôle sera joué par des humains. Vous pourrez même choisir à qui confier cette responsabilité, tant que ces individus gardent à l'esprit que nous détenons le pouvoir et qu'ils suivent nos consignes. »
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas l'intention de faire siéger mes frères et sœurs au conseil, mon-keigh. Ce rôle sera joué par des humains. Vous pourrez même choisir à qui confier cette responsabilité, tant que ces individus gardent à l'esprit que nous détenons le pouvoir et qu'ils suivent nos consignes. »

languages.text: «Mi intención no es sentar a mis hermanos en el consejo, mon-keigh. Ese papel lo desempeñarán los humanos; elige a quien consideres adecuado para el cargo. Siempre y cuando recuerden quién está detrás de ellos y sigan nuestras instrucciones...».
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: «Mi intención no es sentar a mis hermanos en el consejo, mon-keigh. Ese papel lo desempeñarán los humanos; elige a quien consideres adecuado para el cargo. Siempre y cuando recuerden quién está detrás de ellos y sigan nuestras instrucciones...».

languages.text: "Konseye kendi soydaşlarımı yerleştirme gayem yok mon-keigh. Konseyde insanlar olacak... Başlarında kimin olduğunu unutmadıkları ve hükümlerimize uydukları müddetçe bu iş için kimi istersen seçebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "It is not my intention to have my brothers and sisters sit on the council, mon-keigh. That role will be played by humans — you may choose whomever you wish for this task. As long as they remember who stands behind them and heed our direction."

traits.locale_text: "Konseye kendi soydaşlarımı yerleştirme gayem yok mon-keigh. Konseyde insanlar olacak... Başlarında kimin olduğunu unutmadıkları ve hükümlerimize uydukları müddetçe bu iş için kimi istersen seçebilirsin."
